text: :bulb: We desperately need to have tree view back in the Website pages area. Some of our larger clients with over 200+ pages would really benefit from seeing a tree structure of their site for easy viewing of content. I know marketing people dont use it as much, but developers really need it.
Let's talk about this one for sure. I'm all :ear: s
